answers.answer: Call your doc if it doesn't get better in a day or two. Make sure you are eating a healthy diet and drinking a lot. Sounds like blood sugar issues or maybe dehydration.

Could be low iron I had that and it was awful to till I got a prescription for it.. or it may be gestational diabetes which I also had I didn't have to check my sugar or take inclin I just had to watch the amount or non amount of sugar I ate.. but just to be safe you should go see your Dr :)

question: Okay mommies I'm 28 weeks and a couple days.  Tonight I am spending the night with a bucket next to me cause I feel really sick and I'm really dizzy.  The thing is I never got sick before this.  Is this normal or should I be worried???
title: sick and dizzy
